Source.Name: attract
Source.Summary: A graphical front-end for command line emulators that hides the underlying operating system and is intended to be controlled with a joystick or gamepad.
Source.Description: Attract-Mode is a graphical frontend for command line emulators such as MAME, MESS, and Nestopia. It hides the underlying operating system and is intended to be controlled with a joystick, gamepad or spin dial, making it ideal for use in arcade cabinet setups.
